newsitem.title: USA: N.Y. bank discount window borrowings nil Aug 13 wk.
newsitem.headline: N.Y. bank discount window borrowings nil Aug 13 wk.

text.p: The six major New York City banks did not borrow from the Federal Reserve's discount window in the week ended August 13, a Fed spokeswoman said.
It was the end of the two-week bank maintenance period.
